events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was involved in a rear-end collision on the highway yesterday afternoon.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the review of the initial report submitted by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the claim to assist with the claim process and provide updates going forward.
We have acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and our team will begin processing your request promptly.
Please submit the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and your driverâ€™s license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents, including the accident report and photos, have been submitted successfully for your claim.
Our claims investigation team has begun assessing the details of your auto accident claim and verifying all provided information.
The investigation into the circumstances of the collision has been completed and the report supports your claim as valid.
A settlement proposal reflecting the repair costs and vehicle assessment has been sent for your review and approval.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the timely communication and the fairness of the proposed settlement.
Your auto accident claim has been approved in full based on the investigation and supporting documents provided.
The payment for repairs and damages assessed has been issued and should be received in your account within 3 business days.
Your auto accident claim has now been formally closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
The case files and documentation related to your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
